metadata.name: Bouncing Apes
metadata.description:
Introducing Bouncing Apes, the non-stop, adrenaline pumping video game that will have you on the edge of your seat! The ape character (6529) is navigating through a futuristic cityscape, dodging endless spikey tubes, avoid hitting the ground nor the spikes thus will end the game and restart it from the beginning.

This game is meant to be played only on the desktop, PC/MAC/LINUX. To control 6529 you must hit the space bar to bounce.

To Play : Mint This NFT, Then proceed to Token Gated Page to show proof of ownership of NFT to unlock the game zip file to play Bouncing Apes!

Enjoy & Thank You For Playing My Video Game. Neru.eth
